title: Reformational Scripture Reading, Human Sexuality and the CRC with Clay Libolt and John Van Donk
description:
Clay Libolt is a retired minister in the Christian Reformed Church. He wrote a piece on a listserve that we are both on about the CRC Report on Human Sexuality. John Van Donk is also a mutual friend and so it seemed good to have him on the channel for a conversation. I'll be doing a number of videos on the CRC and this report which will be taken up in June of 2022. 

Report on Human Sexuality https://www.crcna.org/sites/default/files/human_sexuality_report_2021.pdf
John Van Donk Playlist https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=78jrJ66xdkU&list=PLYSXopxC8Z9v6ntQs870UewdmfDqqLOm2

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/zjRM74X3

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
